column4: Did anyone notice that writing an email in Thunderbird will show the Netscape icon on the upleft corner of the window?
Oh, MrObviousk, I am using Xubuntu.
I don't know what kind of an icon that is but I know I'm not getting the kind of icon I'm expecting to see
It's green-blue on the top, grey on the bottom.  That's most definitively Netscape.
though I've got my thunderbird from mozilla site, not from ubuntu repos, you?
came with Xubuntu.  Good luck!  (You have x on your server?  You use a server?)
I think that's the exactly same that I see too, then
They should compress the reps, it'd be way faster and would give 'em more bandwidth.
the packages in the repos are compressed
a little bit.  It's still slow on dial-up/lite high speed
